job.name: LcKppi
job.command: # cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} set Name = `basename ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}` setenv NODEBUG yes setenv STARFPE NO setup 64b # starver TFG19g echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # set name = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else exit 1; endif set name = "" foreach name (K_S0Fixed Lambda0_barFixed Lambda0Fixed XiM_barFixed XiMFixed Omega_barFixed OmegaFixed \ LNNFixed LNFixed \ H3LdpFixed H3LFixed H3LrFixed \ H4LtpFixed H4L2dFixed H4LFixed H5LFixed H6L3Fixed H6LFixed \ He4LFixed \ He5L3Fixed He5LFixed He5Li5Fixed \ He6L3adFixed He6L3Fixed He6LFixed \ He7L3Fixed He7LFixed \ Li6LFixed \ Li7L3Fixed Li7LFixed \ Li8LFixed \ K_S0 Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega \ LNN LN \ H3Ldp H3L H3Lr \ H4Ltp H4L2d H4L H5L H6L3 H6L \ He4L \ He5L3 He5L He5Li5 \ He6L3ad He6L3 He6L \ He7L3 He7L \ Li6L \ Li7L3 Li7L \ Li8L ) echo $Name | grep $name if (! $?) break; # if ($name == $Name) break; end echo "name = $name"; if ($name == "") exit 1; # setenv StarEndMakerShell # set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,VFMinuitX,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; #Stx set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; #StiCA set chain = "MC.2020a,P2020a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; set sdt = ",sdt20200211.052520" set VFMCE = ",VFMCE"; set Chain = ${chain}${VFMCE}${sdt}",Rung."${rung} set base = ${name}_${rung}_${f}_${N}; set file = ${base}.MuDst.root set tag = ${base}.tags.root set logFile = ${base}B.log echo "${file}" if (-r ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/../xyz.root) ln -s ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/../xyz.root PVxyz.root if ( ! -r ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${file}) then if (! -r ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${base}.bla.root) then touch ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${base}.bla.root # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'","'${tag}'")' >& ${logFile} root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} cp ${base}* ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} rm ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${base}.bla.root endif endif
